message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it's incredibly valuable and I'm confident it will be a great investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $13,000? I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $11,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers.
